extendedInfo.description: This is not an mp3 app, This plays live Hip Hop radio! Now users can message and Follow other DroidHop Radio users!!! Don't be fooled, this is the best Hip Hop radio app for Android.Listen to live hiphop Radio from the number one app dedicated to hip-hop & R&B,!24 hours a day listen live on the go to music from your favorites!For my old heads (like myself), remember when rap was raw like sushi?Listen to old school, raw rap, streaming live 24 hours a day with Droid Hop Live!Reggae stations playing some a dem new dancehall or old school tunes tu raas. si me ?R&B radio stations for the ladies or the men trying to get them. whatever your preference homie. uhhhh!chat and follow other DroidHop Radio users with our social features ( swipe left side of your screen).no need to register, Use your existing Facebook or twitter accounts.Send Direct messages to other users. UNLIKE some other similar apps, we do not flood your screen with popups, and install icons all over your droid! We recommend that you have a fast internet connection for optimum app performance. Wifi, mifi, 4G, et cetera, et cetera. Its been tested and with a good cell provider, it works without skipping. Still report errors as you find them.We do accept direct mp3 submissions from producer ( instrumental creators or other), artist et cetera .We will play your music on DroidHop's Official Radio station.  Submit music you want us to play on Beats Anonymous / DroidHop Official Radio to my account within the app. or contact me on twitter @eyekayuMixtape, instrumental, Rap, R&b, submissions welcome. Enjoy tons of social features on our DroidHop Network.The reason for the additional permissions in this version is because of our implemented radar feature where users will be able to connect with fellow Droid Hop users in their home turf. A great way to connect with like minded individuals near by and far.WIndows8 / Win / Mac users:Get Youwave from http://bit.ly/bO4amj or use BlueStacks http://bit.ly/gcC4Fi .Custom DroidHop Radio for Bluestacks / Yourwave:Latest: https://copy.com/vuzPQMLjVmZR(older) https://copy.com/2IjwvJSB2DTRPROMOTIONAL OPPORTUNITIESDroidHop Radio accepts ads from businesses or ad networks. Audio, video, image or text ads are welcomed. email us,  tweet us @eyekayu or message us within the app for package details.DISCLAIMER / Privacy Policy We are in no way affiliated with most of the radio stations featured in this app. If you are an owner or an affiliate of any of the station providers within this app, and would like for us to remove your station, images, promo content, please contact us and we will remove your radio stream. If you are are Radio Station owner please contact us if you would like your radio station featured in our app. We will never post on your social profiles. We only use twitter and Facebook for easy social login within DroidHop Radio--All in app chats to me are live and its not a machine you all are talking to. The reason why I may not answer right away is because My device may not be on me at the time. We are working on peer to peer chat addon.--PERMISSIONS EXPLAINEDGPSThis is solely used for the "listeners In My Area" Tab. This allows DroidHop Listeners to find and follow like minded individuals near by and far. If you do not want to show up on the map, do not log into the app, you will just have an anonymous icon.INTERNETTo get Radio Stations and adsREAD PHONE STATUS AND IDENTITYBasically when your phone rings, the app will turn off and resume when you call is done.STORAGEStores your user detailsIf you would like to know about any additional permissions, please message me within the app.--droid hop radio Live : Dance, jams,  news, music, video, bling, rap, droid, hop, shout, trill, hood, popular, trap music, dj mixes, mix, stations, hip hop's, soul, r&b, rnb, FM, smooth, bloodclat, track, tracks, channel, beatz, beats, black, stream, south, dj, vol, free, show, daily, media,

reviews.comment: Hip-hop all the time,what\'s better than that?
reviews.author: Adam Deupree

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: The best app. But sometime the music se para, deja de sonar y luego vuelve a reproducirse.
reviews.author: jorge castro

reviews.title: The best radio app
reviews.comment: This is the best app ever.lots of hip-hop stations for free.I love it
reviews.author: Elena Iurco

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: My hat off to developer of this app for keeping it /free & all the hard detailed work into DHRimmediately fixing bugs/etc..)..I\'ve tried every conceiable streaming music player out there & This is #1 in my book..It May not have tons of stations but the dev adds them as they are requested...That\'s a instant personal touch( which is non- existant out there,:-) !! that earns it 10+ stars in my book
reviews.author: Bill Brophy

reviews.title: Good app for rap hip hop listeners
reviews.comment: Plays the good jams..no matter what your into
reviews.author: Brandon Wimberley

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Download it people you will love it, awesome tunes
reviews.author: David Jones

reviews.comment: Sick app. Much more stations than the others
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Music at your finger tips!\302\241!!
reviews.comment: Great app love the variety of music.
